verses.plain: Praise ye the LORD. I will praise the LORD with my whole heart, in the assembly of the upright, and in the congregation.

tokens.t: whole heart, in the assembly of the upright, and

verses.plain: The works of the LORD are great, sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.

tokens.t: great, sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.

verses.plain: His work is honourable and glorious: and his righteousness endureth for ever.

tokens.t: honourable and glorious: and his righteousness endureth for ever.

verses.plain: He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: the LORD is gracious and full of compassion.

tokens.t: He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: the

verses.plain: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.

tokens.t: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.

verses.plain: He hath shewed his people the power of his works, that he may give them the heritage of the heathen.

tokens.t: He hath shewed his people the power of his works, that he may give them the heritage of the heathen.

verses.plain: The works of his hands are verity and judgment; all his commandments are sure.

tokens.t: verity and judgment; all his commandments

verses.plain: They stand fast for ever and ever, and are done in truth and uprightness.

tokens.t: They stand fast for ever and ever,

verses.plain: He sent redemption unto his people: he hath commanded his covenant for ever: holy and reverend is his name.

tokens.t: He sent redemption unto his people: he hath commanded his covenant for ever: holy and reverend

verses.plain: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.

tokens.t: the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do
